tool_description: Creates and manages collections of permissions that can be assigned to roles, with support for resource-specific and action-based permissions.

resources.description: List of resources these permissions apply to

scope.description: Permission scope: global, department, project, individual

error_messages: Permission set name already exists: Choose a unique name for the permission set.
Invalid scope value: Use one of [global, department, project, individual].
Empty permission list: At least one permission must be specified.
Invalid expiry date: Provide a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Duplicate permissions detected: Remove duplicate entries from the permissions array.
usage: Create permission sets by specifying permission_set_name, permissions, resources, and actions. Add conditions and scope as needed for fine-grained control.

permission_set_id.description: Unique identifier for the permission set

permission_count.description: Number of permissions in the set

scope.description: Applied scope for the permission set

status.description: Creation status of the permission set
